grand_tech_fest_2026.title: Grand Tech Fest 2026
grand_tech_fest_2026.description: Experience the ultimate convergence of technology and innovation. Join us for a 3-day marathon of workshops, hackathons, and networking with industry leaders.

starry_cultural_night.title: Starry Cultural Night
starry_cultural_night.description: Celebrate the diverse traditions of our campus through music, dance, and art. An evening filled with vibrant performances and soul-stirring melodies.

annual_sports_marathon.title: Annual Sports Marathon
annual_sports_marathon.description: Push your limits in the biggest athletic event of the year. Compete across multiple tracks and win prestigious awards for sportsmanship and excellence.

ai_and_innovation_hackathon_2026.title: AI & Innovation Hackathon 2026
ai_and_innovation_hackathon_2026.description: Join the brightest minds to solve real-world problems using Artificial Intelligence. A 48-hour challenge to build innovative solutions and win exciting prizes.
